title: Delivery over 500 Miles | Good Omens ◟MV◝
author: TGOE's Edits
comment: Yes. The most significant character of Good Omens. The mailman, the mail carrier, the mail deliverer. He brought the message. None of this could've happened without him. 😔 🙌
Props to this man for his dedication to his job.
I loved how in the end he gets to return.  Loved Omens
He delivered when no one else would.
Every time I hear this song all I can imagine is that one video of David Tennant singing 500 miles. It was literally so adorable and still melts my bloody heart today! 💕😭👌
description:
An edit in honor of the Delivery Man, the only being with more than two brain cells. I just adore this character for absolutely  no reason. He's just such a lovely dedicated man who adores his wife. This was made for the Minor Characters Challenge on Amino. 
তততততততততততত
Music: I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles) by The Proclaimers
Do not repost my edit w/o permission
